createapplication.name: CreateApplication
createapplication.description: Grants permission to create an application, optionally including an AWS SAM file to create the first application version in the same call

createapplicationversion.name: CreateApplicationVersion
createapplicationversion.description: Grants permission to create an application version

createcloudformationchangeset.name: CreateCloudFormationChangeSet
createcloudformationchangeset.description: Grants permission to create an AWS CloudFormation ChangeSet for the given application

createcloudformationtemplate.name: CreateCloudFormationTemplate
createcloudformationtemplate.description: Grants permission to create an AWS CloudFormation template

deleteapplication.name: DeleteApplication
deleteapplication.description: Grants permission to delete the specified application

getapplication.name: GetApplication
getapplication.description: Grants permission to get the specified application

getapplicationpolicy.name: GetApplicationPolicy
getapplicationpolicy.description: Grants permission to get the policy for the specified application

getcloudformationtemplate.name: GetCloudFormationTemplate
getcloudformationtemplate.description: Grants permission to get the specified AWS CloudFormation template

listapplicationdependencies.name: ListApplicationDependencies
listapplicationdependencies.description: Grants permission to retrieve the list of applications nested in the containing application

listapplicationversions.name: ListApplicationVersions
listapplicationversions.description: Grants permission to list versions for the specified application owned by the requester

listapplications.name: ListApplications
listapplications.description: Grants permission to list applications owned by the requester

putapplicationpolicy.name: PutApplicationPolicy
putapplicationpolicy.description: Grants permission to put the policy for the specified application

searchapplications.name: SearchApplications
searchapplications.description: Grants permission to get all applications authorized for this user

unshareapplication.name: UnshareApplication
unshareapplication.description: Grants permission to unshare the specified application

updateapplication.name: UpdateApplication
updateapplication.description: Grants permission to update meta-data of the application
